oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lectures and Demonstrations Delivered by J. M. Trotter
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for lecture and demonstrations by Dr. J. M. Trotter, President of the Virginia Emigration and Manufacturing Association, on a plan to buy land and form joint stock companies in order to build factories in the southern United States. Not only will Trotter present his Book and Chart on the Science of Physiology, the Temperaments, and Phrenology, but he will also explain how "everyone can get good homes in South Florida."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides
Broadsides; Phrenology; Stock Companies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Phrenology is the study of human character and mental capacity by means of examining skull features. Quite popular in the early 19th century, it is now largely considered to be a pseudo-science.
